name: PredictionIO, Inc.
description: Developer of an open-source, machine-learning server. The company offers a machine learning platform for software developers and data engineers to create predictive features, such as personalization, recommendation and content discovery.
one_liner: Developer of an open-source, machine-learning server. The company offers a machine learning platform for software developers and data engineers to create predictive features, such as personalization, recommendation and content discovery.
